name: Isaac Newton
what_did:
Newton discovered the law of gravity — how things fall and move.
He invented important ideas in physics and calculus.
He also studied light and built one of the first reflecting telescopes.
why_matters:
Newton changed how we understand the universe.
His laws still help us send rockets into space.
He showed that the world follows rules we can discover through math and science.
